name: plansiteos
description: AI-powered blueprint takeoff and estimation platform for plumbing contractors
author: CTL Plumbing LLC

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run test:apps && npm run test:packages && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:apps: npm --prefix apps/api test && npm --prefix apps/worker test && npm --prefix apps/web test && npm --prefix apps/blueprint-foundation/frontend test
scripts.test:packages: npm --prefix packages_temp/ai-core test && npm --prefix packages_temp/contracts test && npm --prefix packages_temp/shared test && npm --prefix packages_temp/db test
